comment: It's time ! Tonight we're gonna spread some love ! No cuffs ! Tweet and I'll you back ! Now - Assume the position !
amr:
# ::snt It's time ! Tonight we're gonna spread some love ! No cuffs ! Tweet and I'll you back ! Now - Assume the position !
(m / multi-sentence

            :ARG1 (ii / it))
      :snt2 (s / spread-01

            :ARG1 (l / love-01
                  :quant (s2 / some))
            :time (d / date-entity
                  :dayperiod (n / night)
                  :mod (t / today)))

            :polarity -)
      :snt4 (a / and
            :op1 (t2 / tweet-02
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y / you))
            :op2 (b2 / back-02
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG1 (y2 / you)))
      :snt5 (a2 / assume-02
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y3 / you)
            :ARG1 (p / position-02)
            :time (n2 / now)))
